meanings.definition: Deicides: Those who kill a god.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of deicides who dared to challenge the gods.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts mention deicides as powerful beings.
meanings.sent3: The deicides in the story were determined to overthrow the divine rulers.
meanings.sent4: In the myth, the deicides rose up against the god of thunder.
meanings.sent5: The deicides were feared and respected by all who heard their name.

meanings.definition: Deicides: The act of killing a god.
meanings.sent1: The deicides in the tale were driven by revenge.
meanings.sent2: The deicides committed the ultimate sacrilege by slaying a god.
meanings.sent3: The deicides' plot to eliminate a deity ended in chaos and disbelief.
meanings.sent4: The deicides' actions shook the very foundations of the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The deicides' deed echoed through the realms, forever changing the balance of power.
